title: Build Quiz Engine
description: Create the quiz module with difficulty levels, scoring logic, and ability to record user responses and time-taken.
ai_description: Generates the performance data required for personalization.

title: Implement Weak Topic Detection
description: Write logic to calculate topic-wise accuracy and automatically flag weak areas using predefined thresholds.
ai_description: Allows the adaptive system to recommend revision tasks.

title: Create Performance Event Tracking
description: Set up event logging for question correctness, time per question, topic-switching, and quiz completion for each attempt.
ai_description: Feeds structured learning data into the system.

title: Define MVP Success Metrics
description: Create a list of KPIs such as accuracy improvement, weekly activity, quiz completion rate, and retention to measure MVP traction.
ai_description: Gives investors a measurable way to judge early performance.

title: Prepare Early Pilot Outreach Plan
description: Identify initial colleges or student groups and prepare a pitch brief for onboarding them into the beta testing phase.
ai_description: Shows investors the early adoption and outreach strategy.
